data.title: Karl Marx - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: A 19th-century philosopher, economist, sociologist, journalist, and revolutionary socialist who co-authored 'The Communist Manifesto' with Friedrich Engels. His theories about society, economics, and politics—collectively known as Marxism—hold that human societies develop through class struggle.
data.text:
Definition

A 19th-century philosopher, economist, sociologist, journalist, and revolutionary socialist who co-authored 'The Communist Manifesto' with Friedrich Engels. His theories about society, economics, and politics—collectively known as Marxism—hold that human societies develop through class struggle.
